component.name: libx52pro0
component.summary: MFD and LED library for Saitek X52pro joysticks

description.p: The library libx52pro is designed to support MFD and LED found on Saitek X52 and X52pro joystick. Library does not deal with the HID part of the joystick since this feature is already fully supported by the Linux kernel 2.6.x. This package include the x52output utility.
